original_text: When Jacob came from the field in the evening, Leah went out to meet him and said, “You must come in to me, for I have hired you with my son's mandrakes.” So he lay with her that night.
korean_text: 저물 때에 야곱이 들에서 돌아오매 레아가 나와서 그를 영접하며 이르되 내게로 들어오라 내가 내 아들의 합환채로 당신을 샀노라 그 밤에 야곱이 그와 동침하였더라

sentences.original_text: When Jacob came from the field in the evening
Leah went out to meet him
You must come in to me
for I have hired you with my son's mandrakes
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 아들의 만드라케로 당신을 삼았으니까

sentences.original_text: So he lay with her that night
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그날 밤 그녀와 함께 누웠다
